title: Maybe a new skin for Sona
body:
Hi Riot

This is just an idea.
 Since Sona is based on Hatsune Miku, just with some changes (they look similar, Sona just looks more mature), I would like to see a new Sona skin when she looks like Hatsune Miku (eg use one of the million dance costumes she has or her original/main).
I really love most of her costumes or maybe make her dress up as Black Rock Shooter. I dont know, it's just, it's been a while since you released a new one (even though sweetheart sona was just released earlier this year). 
Maybe the linked pic (or something close to that) should be added in the Academy Skins along with Ekko, Vlad, Ahri and Darius? 

I have almost all of the Sona skins (missing muse) and would really just like to see a new one.

I dont know. This is just a thought/suggestion. Im a Sona main and i just like using her a lot
